answers.answer: Try to find a holistic nutritionist, since you have a special problem with the diabetes.  Type 2 is largely a dietary disease, and you know by now most likely what you need to avoid, but diet is a very individual thing depending on how well you digest food, etc.  So that's why I suggest consulting a professional.

question: I would like some help with losing weight and starting a new lifestyle of eating and exercise.  I have Type 2 Diabetes and have kept my A1C under 7.0 except for 2 months ago and it hit 7.0.Would appreciate any help you could provide.
title: Want to lose Weight
